snippet: The issues faced by Sgt. Bowe Bergdahl’s unit in many ways reflected the problems of the Pentagon’s strategy writ large across Afghanistan at that moment of the war.
abstract: Internal Army investigation into disappearance of Sgt Bowe Bergdahl from Second Platoon, Blackfoot Company in the First Battalion, 501st Regiment finds platoon suffered from lapses in discipline and security in period before Bergdahl disappeared; platoon's problems in many ways reflected those of the Pentagon's strategy writ large across Afghanistan and at that time in the war.

byline.original: By RICHARD A. OPPEL Jr. and ERIC SCHMITT
byline.contributor: Richard A. Oppel Jr. reported from New York, and Eric Schmitt from Washington. Charlie Savage contributed reporting from Washington, and Andrew W. Lehren from New York.
